Liste des matières

Pas de Matière
import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Subject} from "../../model/subject.model"; import {SubjectService} from "../subject.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-subject-list', templateUrl: './subject-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./subject-list.component.css'] }) export class SubjectListComponent implements OnInit{ subjects : Subject[] = []; constructor(private subServ: SubjectService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.subServ.getAll().subscribe(v => this.subjects = v) } }
